body.p:
Boonville Ky
oct 10th 1865
To His Excellency the Governor of The Commonwealth of Kentucky=
Sir

The undersigned petitioners would most respectfully represent that at the June Term ^1864^ of the Owsley Circuit Court McKinley Maloney was tried & fined $60 -- & cost for Keeping a Tipling house Maloney is a very poor man with a family and not able to pay the debt and unless it is remitted his securities will have to pay the it debt and they are very poor and their Coal which they have raised for market is now levied upon to satisfy it -- We hope you will remit the fine --

We are sir your obt. Servants --
E. B. Treadway
A H. Clark
Andrew Herd
H. B Hampton
Owen Hamilton
L. L. Mamous
Sylvester Isaacs

Owsley Cir Ct
vs
McKinley Maloney
$60
Tipling
16th Oct /65
